statements: SELECT id, event_name, event_timestamp FROM NFTEvents;
SELECT * FROM NFTEvents WHERE event_type = 'Transfer';
SELECT nft_owner, event_action FROM NFTEvents WHERE id = 10;
SELECT event_name, event_type FROM NFTEvents ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, nft_id, nft_owner FROM NFTEvents WHERE event_action = 'Mint' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTEvents WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice' ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_timestamp FROM NFTEvents WHERE nft_owner = 'Bob' AND event_action = 'transfer' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT nft_id, event_name, event_action FROM NFTEvents WHERE event_type = 'mint' ORDER BY nft_id ASC, event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT event_name, event_type FROM NFTEvents WHERE event_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY event_name;
SELECT event_name, COUNT(*) AS total_events FROM NFTEvents GROUP BY event_name HAVING total_events > 5 ORDER BY total_events DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_events;
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM nft_events WHERE nft_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT event_name, nft_id FROM nft_events WHERE event_timestamp < NOW();
SELECT action_name, action_type, action_timestamp FROM triggered_actions WHERE nft_owner = 'Bob';
SELECT nft_id, nft_owner FROM triggered_actions WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp, nft_owner FROM nft_events WHERE nft_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, nft_owner FROM nft_events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, nft_id, nft_owner FROM nft_events WHERE nft_owner LIKE 'Alice%';
SELECT * FROM triggered_actions WHERE action_type = 'transfer' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT nft_id, action_name, action_timestamp FROM triggered_actions WHERE nft_owner = 'Bob' AND action_timestamp < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM NFT_Events;
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM NFT_Events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT event_name FROM NFT_Events WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT trigger_name, action_type FROM Triggers WHERE action_type = 'DELETE';
SELECT * FROM Trigger_History WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY execution_time;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_timestamp FROM NFT_Events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM NFT_Events WHERE event_name LIKE 'Sale%' AND event_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_timestamp ASC;
SELECT th.history_id, t.trigger_name, th.execution_time, th.success FROM Trigger_History th JOIN Triggers t ON th.trigger_id = t.trigger_id WHERE th.success = true ORDER BY th.execution_time DESC;
SELECT t.trigger_name, t.action_type, ne.event_name FROM Triggers t JOIN NFT_Events ne ON t.nft_event_id = ne.event_id WHERE t.action_type = 'Notify' ORDER BY t.trigger_name;

SELECT ne.event_name, COUNT(th.trigger_id) AS trigger_count FROM NFT_Events ne JOIN Triggers t ON ne.event_id = t.nft_event_id JOIN Trigger_History th ON t.trigger_id = th.trigger_id GROUP BY ne.event_name HAVING trigger_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM NFTCollection;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id FROM NFTCollection ORDER BY nft_name DESC;
SELECT nft_id, owner_id, creation_timestamp FROM NFTCollection WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT nft_name FROM NFTCollection WHERE nft_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM NFTEvents WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM NFTCollection WHERE nft_id = 1;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id FROM NFTCollection ORDER BY nft_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTEvents WHERE event_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT nft_name, creation_timestamp FROM NFTCollection WHERE owner_id = 100 ORDER BY creation_timestamp DESC;

SELECT NFTCollection.nft_name, NFTEvents.event_type, TriggerActions.action_type, TriggerLogs.log_message FROM NFTCollection JOIN NFTEvents ON NFTCollection.nft_id = NFTEvents.nft_id JOIN TriggerActions ON NFTEvents.event_id = TriggerActions.event_id JOIN TriggerLogs ON TriggerActions.action_id = TriggerLogs.action_id;
SELECT * FROM nft_events;
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp FROM nft_events WHERE nft_id = 10;
SELECT event_name, event_timestamp, action FROM nft_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM nft_tokens WHERE token_price > 1000;
SELECT token_name, token_owner FROM nft_tokens WHERE token_description LIKE '%rare%';
SELECT * FROM nft_events ORDER BY event_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT event_name, action, event_timestamp FROM nft_events WHERE nft_id = 1002;
SELECT token_name, token_price FROM nft_tokens WHERE token_price > 1000 ORDER BY token_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM trigger_actions WHERE action_description LIKE '%monitor%';
SELECT rule_name, rule_query FROM trigger_rules WHERE trigger_event = 'transfer' ORDER BY rule_id ASC;
